body_html:
Hi!

Please try this:

conda install -c jjhelmus tensorflow

If it does not work, please try googling glibc_2.17 not found centos 6.

The previous solution has been taken from this link.

I hope it helps!

Have a great day,

Miguel Ángel

body:
Hi!

Please try this:

> conda install -c jjhelmus tensorflow 

If it does not work, please try googling [glibc_2.17 not found centos 6](https://www.google.com/search?q=glibc_2.17+not+found+centos+6).

The previous solution has been taken from this [link](https://github.com/conda-forge/tensorflow-feedstock/issues/11).

I hope it helps!

Have a great day,

Miguel Ángel
